     }, 
     "number": "{{Mob}}" 
   }, 
   "phone": "{{Mob}}", 
   "pin": { 
     "cc": true, 
     "city": "{{CityName}}", 
     "cod": true, 
     "code": "{{CityIsoCode}}", 
     "state": "state" 
   }, 
   "postalCode": "0000", 
   "shippingAddress": true, 
   "title": "{{TitleValue}}", 
   "titleCode": "{{Title}}", 
   "town": "{{CityName}}", 
   "townCity": { 
     "isocode": "{{CityIsoCode}}", 
     "name": "{{CityName}}" 
   }, 
   "visibleInAddressBook": true 
 }
